name: general-research
description: General-purpose research for any topic - the default mission for open-ended research questions
objective: Conduct comprehensive research on the given topic, gathering information from multiple sources, synthesizing findings, and producing a well-structured research report with proper citations

phases: Initial broad research to understand the topic
Deep-dive into specific aspects based on initial findings
Fact-checking and validation of key claims
hints: Start with web-researcher for broad overview
Use academic-researcher for scholarly sources if relevant
